title: I Never Thought I’d See This Happen (Ep 1505)
description:
The radical left is now on board supporting riots, stabbings, segregation, government spying, and socialism. Also, LeBron James and “The Squad” are huge frauds. I have the evidence. 

News Picks:


Why “shooting the leg” law enforcement policies won’t work.

Lebron James is a disgrace. Here’s the evidence.

Coca Cola gets busted!
